{"post_stream":{"posts":[{"id":3126986,"name":"Ankur Raghavan","username":"Ankur-Raghavan","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/ankur-raghavan/{size}/207141_2.png","created_at":"2023-01-15T21:14:49.877Z","cooked":"

WCP sent out an email recently to teams that had falcons on back order. They said that vex will not honor the original price of falcons and any orders must be adjusted to the new price.

image1668×427 60.8 KB

Note that payment was submitted in June.

The progress on rebuilding trust in the community seems to be going great…thats wild.

2023 Falcon Updates and Availability

As always, we appreciate your patience and patronage as we look forward to restoring some of the faith we’ve lost over the past year or so. Best of luck to all teams on this upcoming season.

January 3rd, 2023

","post_number":4,"post_type":1,"posts_count":21,"updated_at":"2023-01-15T21:31:03.852Z","reply_count":0,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":0,"reads":798,"readers_count":797,"score":399.6,"yours":false,"topic_id":423300,"topic_slug":"back-ordered-falcon-500-s-not-staying-at-original-price","display_username":"MikLast","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"link_counts":[{"url":"https://www.chiefdelphi.com/t/2023-falcon-updates-and-availability/420604","internal":true,"reflection":false,"title":"2023 Falcon Updates and Availability","clicks":30}],"read":true,"user_title":"","bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[{"id":2,"count":16}],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":23994,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":"You have 45 seconds to reply"},"post_url":"/t/back-ordered-falcon-500-s-not-staying-at-original-price/423300/4","custom_user_title":"You have 45 seconds to reply","reactions":[{"id":"heart","type":"emoji","count":16}],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":16,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":3126995,"name":"Tom Line","username":"Tom_Line","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/tom_line/{size}/236809_2.png","created_at":"2023-01-15T21:31:16.829Z","cooked":"

Does vex allow backordering on their website? This may well be a situation where WCP offered it, but vex doesn’t. So when vex got product, they sell it at the new price to their vendors. I. E., this one may be on WCP.

Yeah, i just checked. Vex doesn’t allow backorders. So if that was exactly what happened then WCP owns this one.

Now, it seems to me like vex should have been communicating the price increase to their vendors well in advance. But based on their issues, customer service might not be high on their list right now.

","post_number":5,"post_type":1,"posts_count":21,"updated_at":"2023-01-15T21:34:32.218Z","reply_count":2,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":4,"reads":787,"readers_count":786,"score":247.4,"yours":false,"topic_id":423300,"topic_slug":"back-ordered-falcon-500-s-not-staying-at-original-price","display_username":"Tom Line","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":"","bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[{"id":2,"count":4}],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":7841,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":"Team 1498"},"post_url":"/t/back-ordered-falcon-500-s-not-staying-at-original-price/423300/5","custom_user_title":"Team 1498","reactions":[{"id":"heart","type":"emoji","count":4}],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":4,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":3126996,"name":"R.C.","username":"R.C","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/r.c/{size}/264998_2.png","created_at":"2023-01-15T21:36:24.562Z","cooked":"

Tom,

We regret that we have to go through and email customers about this instance. This will be not a thing in the future as we will be doing things differently…

We did ship out some V2 motors at the original price but with the V3 version coming out the price has changed. Customers have the option to:

  • Cancel order and receive full refund
  • Lower QTY and receive refund
  • Keep QTY and pay difference

We are extremely sorry about the issue and will not be making a habit of this.

","post_number":6,"post_type":1,"posts_count":21,"updated_at":"2023-01-15T21:36:24.562Z","reply_count":2,"reply_to_post_number":5,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":14,"reads":756,"readers_count":755,"score":816.2,"yours":false,"topic_id":423300,"topic_slug":"back-ordered-falcon-500-s-not-staying-at-original-price","display_username":"R.C.","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":"","reply_to_user":{"id":7841,"username":"Tom_Line","name":"Tom Line","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/tom_line/{size}/236809_2.png"},"bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[{"id":2,"count":37}],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":9979,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"post_url":"/t/back-ordered-falcon-500-s-not-staying-at-original-price/423300/6","custom_user_title":null,"reactions":[{"id":"heart","type":"emoji","count":37},{"id":"-1","type":"emoji","count":1}],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":38,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":3126998,"name":"Tom Line","username":"Tom_Line","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/tom_line/{size}/236809_2.png","created_at":"2023-01-15T21:37:39.858Z","cooked":"

Annnnnd that’s how you do good customer service.

","post_number":7,"post_type":1,"posts_count":21,"updated_at":"2023-01-15T21:38:03.425Z","reply_count":0,"reply_to_post_number":6,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":0,"reads":739,"readers_count":738,"score":537.8,"yours":false,"topic_id":423300,"topic_slug":"back-ordered-falcon-500-s-not-staying-at-original-price","display_username":"Tom Line","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":"","reply_to_user":{"id":9979,"username":"R.C","name":"R.C.","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/r.c/{size}/264998_2.png"},"bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[{"id":2,"count":24}],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":7841,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":"Team 1498"},"post_url":"/t/back-ordered-falcon-500-s-not-staying-at-original-price/423300/7","custom_user_title":"Team 1498","reactions":[{"id":"heart","type":"emoji","count":24},{"id":"question","type":"emoji","count":1}],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":25,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":3126999,"name":"Bryce Hanson","username":"BryceHanson","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/brycehanson/{size}/159972_2.png","created_at":"2023-01-15T21:38:33.085Z","cooked":"

Definitely a tough spot for WCP, but this is just about the best way to handle it (short of eating the difference, which I don’t think is fair to y’all since it’s not your price hike). Props to y’all!

","post_number":8,"post_type":1,"posts_count":21,"updated_at":"2023-01-15T21:38:33.085Z","reply_count":0,"reply_to_post_number":6,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":0,"reads":733,"readers_count":732,"score":311.6,"yours":false,"topic_id":423300,"topic_slug":"back-ordered-falcon-500-s-not-staying-at-original-price","display_username":"Bryce Hanson","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":"","reply_to_user":{"id":9979,"username":"R.C","name":"R.C.","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/r.c/{size}/264998_2.png"},"bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[{"id":2,"count":11}],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":31172,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":"125M/7525M | MC/GA "},"post_url":"/t/back-ordered-falcon-500-s-not-staying-at-original-price/423300/8","custom_user_title":"125M/7525M | MC/GA ","reactions":[{"id":"heart","type":"emoji","count":11}],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":11,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":3127000,"name":"Troy Dietz","username":"troy_dietz","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/troy_dietz/{size}/135768_2.png","created_at":"2023-01-15T21:39:49.024Z","cooked":"

Blink twice if Vex made you sign a non-disparagement agreement.

","post_number":9,"post_type":1,"posts_count":21,"updated_at":"2023-01-15T21:39:49.024Z","reply_count":0,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":6,"reads":714,"readers_count":713,"score":487.8,"yours":false,"topic_id":423300,"topic_slug":"back-ordered-falcon-500-s-not-staying-at-original-price","display_username":"Troy Dietz","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":"","bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[{"id":2,"count":21}],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":26760,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":"❤️ conflict-free COTS"},"post_url":"/t/back-ordered-falcon-500-s-not-staying-at-original-price/423300/9","custom_user_title":"❤️ conflict-free COTS","reactions":[{"id":"heart","type":"emoji","count":21},{"id":"laughing","type":"emoji","count":12}],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":33,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":3127016,"name":"Alex Van Aacken","username":"Pompano","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/pompano/{size}/174351_2.png","created_at":"2023-01-15T22:09:34.043Z","cooked":"

I think the bigger issue comes from VEX not notifying the 3rd party seller WAY in advance of a price hike and new motor version. This puts vendors like WCP in a tough spot because they have sold (backordered) a product VEX doesn’t make anymore, and that cannot be sold at the agreed upon original price.

(just doesn’t feel right to me even if it is “fair” to everyone involved)

","post_number":10,"post_type":1,"posts_count":21,"updated_at":"2023-01-15T22:10:37.647Z","reply_count":0,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":0,"reads":683,"readers_count":682,"score":211.6,"yours":false,"topic_id":423300,"topic_slug":"back-ordered-falcon-500-s-not-staying-at-original-price","display_username":"Alex Van Aacken","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":"","bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[{"id":2,"count":6}],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":50713,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":"6925 Alum"},"post_url":"/t/back-ordered-falcon-500-s-not-staying-at-original-price/423300/10","custom_user_title":"6925 Alum","reactions":[{"id":"heart","type":"emoji","count":5},{"id":"point_up","type":"emoji","count":1}],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":6,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":3127017,"name":"brandn03","username":"brandn03","avatar_template":"/letter_avatar_proxy/v4/letter/b/b5e925/{size}.png","created_at":"2023-01-15T22:11:03.994Z","cooked":"
Tom_Line:

So when vex got product, they sell it at the new price to their vendors. I. E., this one may be on WCP.

I tend to agree. While VEX is far from innocent, I dont believe this one is entirely on them.

For reference:

I ordered 8 Falcons in March 2022. The restock date at that time was ~1 week. They were instock at VEX at the time of my order. I relayed to WCP that I needed these motors for a summer course I was teaching. I was informed that they would be back in stock in time, or WCP would drop ship the motors from VEX to me. About a month later I followed up again and was told the motors would not be back in stock until November/December and they couldnt drop ship from VEX becuase VEX was out of stock.

They did find 4 falcons with the known loctite issue to send me so I could get through the summer.

10 months later I get an email asking me to pay an additional $160 to get the 4 other motors or take a refund.

I couldnt take a refund becuase they were purchased with expired grant fundingn. Plus we really needed the motors. WCP finally offered to send me 3 new falcons and one used Falcon in unknown condition (along with a $50 credit).

I feel like WCP got in this position by selling motors that they didnt have and then when the price increased they passed the entire price increase on to the customer who payed them nearly a year before.

While it may not have been possible for WCP to eat the entire cost increase, I feel like they could have at least shared the burden with the customer instead of asking the customer to take it on entirely.

Just my opinion.

Edit: I just received an email from WCP stating that they found 4 V2 falcons that they could send me.

Edit2: Was told these motors are in new condition, but possibly missing loctite.

","post_number":11,"post_type":1,"posts_count":21,"updated_at":"2023-01-15T22:27:30.395Z","reply_count":0,"reply_to_post_number":5,"quote_count":1,"incoming_link_count":0,"reads":670,"readers_count":669,"score":179.0,"yours":false,"topic_id":423300,"topic_slug":"back-ordered-falcon-500-s-not-staying-at-original-price","display_username":"brandn03","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":3,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":"","bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[{"id":2,"count":3}],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":25861,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":"6802 Head Coach"},"post_url":"/t/back-ordered-falcon-500-s-not-staying-at-original-price/423300/11","custom_user_title":"6802 Head Coach","reactions":[{"id":"heart","type":"emoji","count":3}],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":3,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":3127019,"name":"","username":"Ashray.g","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/ashray.g/{size}/194161_2.png","created_at":"2023-01-15T22:20:15.635Z","cooked":"

Ex post facto moment

","post_number":12,"post_type":1,"posts_count":21,"updated_at":"2023-01-15T22:20:15.635Z","reply_count":0,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":0,"reads":601,"readers_count":600,"score":150.2,"yours":false,"topic_id":423300,"topic_slug":"back-ordered-falcon-500-s-not-staying-at-original-price","display_username":"","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":"","bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[{"id":2,"count":1}],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":49561,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":"retired"},"post_url":"/t/back-ordered-falcon-500-s-not-staying-at-original-price/423300/12","custom_user_title":"retired","reactions":[{"id":"heart","type":"emoji","count":2}],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":1,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":3127039,"name":"Jon Stratis","username":"Jon_Stratis","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/jon_stratis/{size}/2663_2.png","created_at":"2023-01-15T22:51:39.963Z","cooked":"

It’s incredible that we have a product like this unavailable for over half a year, and when it finally does become available, they decide they want more money for it. I know, we’ve already hashed out the $40 price hike Vex brought out, but now it’s even more ridiculous.

Honestly, given the severe lack of availability of the Falcon ever since it was introduced, it feels almost like a kickstarter campaign with every shipment!

","post_number":13,"post_type":1,"posts_count":21,"updated_at":"2023-01-15T22:51:39.963Z","reply_count":1,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":0,"reads":579,"readers_count":578,"score":405.8,"yours":false,"topic_id":423300,"topic_slug":"back-ordered-falcon-500-s-not-staying-at-original-price","display_username":"Jon Stratis","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":"","bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[{"id":2,"count":19}],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":7968,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":"FRC 2177 Mentor, LRI, MN RPC"},"post_url":"/t/back-ordered-falcon-500-s-not-staying-at-original-price/423300/13","custom_user_title":"FRC 2177 Mentor, LRI, MN RPC","reactions":[{"id":"heart","type":"emoji","count":19}],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":19,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":3127047,"name":"51 Drive Coach","username":"Josh_Murphy","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/josh_murphy/{size}/196759_2.png","created_at":"2023-01-15T22:58:17.314Z","cooked":"

This is disappointing news. The question I have is how many of these motors were sold at this price while listed on backorder? I’m questioning why orders were still accepted on a product that had such an unknown eta. Teams have already been left in the dark as is,
about falcons and when they’d be back in stock, to now be told, well, we have to break the agreement, just seems like WCP shouldnt have continued to accept orders IMO. I do understand they arent completely in charge of the issue, however accepting x amount of orders on a product that is so limited, is questionable.

It really is.

We are in the process of switching to NEOs. Between the QA issues, pheniox Pro, availability and price increases we have had enough. Not to mention the other issues VEX has had this year.

WCP told me in April that they would not be instock until November or December. But it appears they continued to take orders until atleast June, according to OP.

With VEX’s history of increasing the price of the Falcon, it shouldnt have came as a shock that it happened.

Damn, just another reason to avoid IFI. In all seriousness, neither IFI or WCP has any right to ask for price adjustments after the money has been paid. It’s not even no right, it’s the fact that it’s straight up not legal. There’s a lot of finer details, but any team that has the ability, I do recommend looking into the legal side further
